params.cap_: The maximum total supply of the bond tokens.
params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the bond tokens.
params.faceValue_: The face value of each bond token in the underlying asset's base units.
params.initialModulePairs_: An array of initial compliance module and parameter pairs.
params.maturityDate_: The Unix timestamp representing the bond's maturity date.
params.requiredClaimTopics_: An array of claim topics required for interacting with the bond.
params.underlyingAsset_: The address of the ERC20 token used as the underlying asset for the bond.

returns.deployedBondAddress: The address of the newly deployed bond contract.

params.identityVerificationModule: The address of the identity verification module.
params.initialAdmin: The address of the initial admin for the token registry.
params.tokenImplementation_: The address of the token implementation contract.

returns._0: tokenImplementation The address of the token implementation contract.

params.cap_: The maximum total supply of the bond tokens.
params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the bond tokens.
params.faceValue_: The face value of each bond token in the underlying asset's base units.
params.initialModulePairs_: An array of initial compliance module and parameter pairs.
params.maturityDate_: The Unix timestamp representing the bond's maturity date.
params.requiredClaimTopics_: An array of claim topics required for interacting with the bond.
params.underlyingAsset_: The address of the ERC20 token used as the underlying asset for the bond.

returns.predictedAddress: The predicted address of the bond contract.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

returns._0: tokenImplementation The address of the token implementation contract.

isValidTokenImplementation(address).notice: Returns the address of the token implementation contract.

predictBondAddress(string,string,uint8,u.notice: Predicts the deployment address of a new ATK Bond.

tokenImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the token implementation contract.

tokenImplementation().notice: Returns the address of the token implementation contract.

BondCreated(address,address,string,strin.notice: Emitted when a new bond is created.

TokenAssetCreated(address,address,addres.notice: Emitted when a new proxy contract is created using CREATE2.

TokenImplementationUpdated(address,addre.notice: Emitted when the token implementation address is updated.

AccessManagerAlreadyDeployed(address).notice: Error when a predicted CREATE2 address for an access manager is already marked as deployed by this factory.

AddressAlreadyDeployed(address).notice: Error when a CREATE2 proxy deployment fails.

InvalidIdentityVerificationModuleAddress.notice: Error when the provided identity verification module address is the zero address.

InvalidImplementationAddress().notice: Error for attempting to unregister a token that is not registered.

InvalidTokenAddress().notice: Custom errors for the factory contract

ProxyCreationFailed().notice: Error for when the provided token implementation address is the zero address.

TokenIdentityAddressMismatch(address,add.notice: Error when a token identity address mismatch is detected.

userdoc.notice: Defines the functions for creating and predicting addresses of ATK Bond instances.

params.cap_: The maximum total supply of the bond tokens.
params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the bond tokens.
params.faceValue_: The face value of each bond token in the underlying asset's base units.
params.initialModulePairs_: An array of initial compliance module and parameter pairs.
params.maturityDate_: The Unix timestamp representing the bond's maturity date.
params.requiredClaimTopics_: An array of claim topics required for interacting with the bond.
params.underlyingAsset_: The address of the ERC20 token used as the underlying asset for the bond.

returns.deployedBondAddress: The address of the newly deployed bond contract.

params.cap: The maximum total supply of the bond tokens.
params.decimals: The number of decimals for the bond tokens.
params.faceValue: The face value of each bond token in the underlying asset's base units.
params.maturityDate: The Unix timestamp representing the bond's maturity date.
params.name: The name of the bond.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the newly created token.
params.underlyingAsset: The address of the ERC20 token used as the underlying asset for the bond.

params.accessManager: The address of the access manager.
params.interfaces: The array of interfaces that the token supports.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the newly created token.
params.tokenIdentity: The address of the token identity.

params.newImplementation: The address of the new token implementation.
params.oldImplementation: The address of the old token implementation.
